messages.subject: Auction Catalog Reference List
messages.msgSnippet: I have created a list of auction catalogs which I have found to be of help to me in the study of fittings.  It can be found at: http://tosogu.blogspot.com/
messages.messageBody:
I have created a list of auction catalogs which I have found to be of
help to me in the study of fittings. It can be found at:
http://tosogu.blogspot.com/
under the above title. Please feel free to take a look and I
hope it is of some help.
